mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Bare, George
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Jasper, Pike Co., Ohio [Jasper, Pike County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Bare, George Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: G.S [gun shot] Wound of left shoulder- bullet entering the acromial extremity of clavicle direction backwards and inwards to exit a little upwords and outwords of the superior angle of scapula- fracuring acromion and clavicle. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Transferred to Parkersburg, West Virginia 1864/09/24.
